L

Language - Interface in simulation.language
An interface providing methods for different kinds of language classes which can be used in computer models of language competition.
languages(Collection<Language>) - Method in class simulation.language.Word
Returns a collection of all languages from the given collection of languages which contain this word.
lexicallySynchronized(Agent[], Environment) - Static method in interface simulation.agent.Agent
Returns true if all agents from the given array are pair-wise lexically synchronized on the given environment.
lexicallySynchronized(Agent, Agent, Environment) - Static method in interface simulation.agent.Agent
Returns true if the two specified agents are lexically synchronized on the given environment.
Lexicon - Interface in simulation.lexicon
An interface providing all methods expected from agents' lexicons in naming games-based computer models of language evolution.
LexiconCreator - Interface in simulation.lexicon.creator
An interface for factory classes for lexicons.
LimitedWeightsLexicon - Class in simulation.lexicon
A class of weighted lexicons in which association between things and words are weighted with values belonging to a closed and bounded interval of real numbers.
LimitedWeightsLexicon(double, double) - Constructor for class simulation.lexicon.LimitedWeightsLexicon
Initializes this lexicon with the given bounds of weights of associations.
LimitedWeightsLexiconCreator - Class in simulation.lexicon.creator
A factory class for creating LimitedWeightsLexicon objects conveniently.
LimitedWeightsLexiconCreator(double, double) - Constructor for class simulation.lexicon.creator.LimitedWeightsLexiconCreator
Initializes this factory with the given minWeight and the given maxWeight.
Listener - Interface in simulation.agent
An interface providing all methods expected to be defined for different kinds of listeners in naming games in computer models of language evolution.
loss(Thing, Word) - Method in interface simulation.agent.Listener
Implements this listener's behaviour after a loss in a naming-game based interaction.
loss(Thing, Word) - Method in interface simulation.agent.Speaker
Implements this speaker's behaviour after a loss in a naming-game based interaction.
loss(Thing, Word) - Method in class simulation.agent.SuccessCountingAgent
Decreases weight of the given word in connection with the given thing and updates counters of losses of the languages to which the given word belongs.
loss(Thing, Word) - Method in class simulation.agent.variant.TotalListener
Has no effect.
loss(Thing, Word) - Method in class simulation.agent.variant.TotalSpeaker
Has no effect
